item.title: ftp.mapsforge.org: "ls" command hangs?
item.description:
From mbi...@gmail.com on June 13, 2012 13:07:21
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Connect to ftp.mapsforge.org 2. Try to get a directory listing What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Expected: Directory listing What I see: The connection hangs until timeout What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Chrome Browser, Linux ftp client, FolderSync (Android) from 2 different locations Please provide any additional information below. Worked fine a week ago.
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=326

item.contents:
From mbi...@gmail.com on June 13, 2012 14:46:43
I use FolderSync for Android to keep the maps on my device up to date. FolderSync only works with FTP servers so I was glad I found ftp.mapsforge.org in Google.
Will the FTP access vanish over the time or do both machines work in parallel?

From pjalaran...@gmail.com on August 10, 2012 02:18:13
The link above was something I found that I thought could help solve the problem. However I just run my program again and all work out fine so the problem is no longer available. I believe you can close this issue.
